description: The Store Link app provides blocks responsible for displaying links in other theme blocks, such as the Product Summary.

scrollTo.description: Element anchor to scroll after navigation. (E.g. '#footer')

target.description: Where to display the linked URL. This prop works the same way as the target from HTML '<a>' element. Since the anchor element's target default is '_self', this prop will be set to '_self' if it's undefined.

anyOf.description: Displays a normal link with no styles
Displays a button that can be customized using the 'buttonProps' prop

displayMode.description: How the link should be displayed

escapeLinkRegex.description: RegExp, with global match, used to remove special characters within product specifications. (E.g. if you want to use '/[%]/g' then 'escapeLinkRegex' = '[%]' )

rel.description: This prop specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document (for better SEO). This prop works the same way as the 'rel' attribute from '<a>', the HTML anchor element. Supported values can be found here

buttonProps.description: How the link button should be displayed. Use this prop only when the 'displayMode' prop is set as 'button'
